cot_head: Let's think step by step, by considering whether each person is lying and if that leads to contradiction.
cot_repeat_steps: Assume David is an altruist. No contradiction is found in their claim that Jacob is not an egoist.
Assume Jacob is an altruist. No contradiction is found in their claim that Henry is an egoist.
Henry cannot be an altruist, because this would contradict the claim of Jacob that Henry is an egoist.
Assume Henry is an egoist. No contradiction is found in their false claim that Jacob is an altruist if and only if Jacob is an egoist.
Luke cannot be an altruist, because this would contradict the claim of their own that Luke is an altruist and David is an egoist.
Assume Luke is an egoist. No contradiction is found in their false claim that Luke is an altruist and David is an egoist.
Assume Aurora is an altruist. No contradiction is found in their claim that Jacob is an altruist if and only if David is an altruist.
